1.Summary: "Great people. Lot of work and opportunities"
1.Cons: Low paid and not enough benefits.

2.Pros: Free meal which is not bad
2.Cons: No big growth opportunities as part time employee

3.Pros: Clean place, good hours, friendly co-workers.
3.Cons: Very short staffed. Orders sometimes took forever and people were impatient. Customers were sometimes obnoxious to deal with.

5.Pros: Very flexible hours. Pretty easy job, they do a good job at training. It's usually full so time goes by fast.
5.Cons: Minimum wage, having to deal with some terrible customers, smelling like fries.

6.Pros: You get to eat nice food.

7.Pros: Flexible hours & days.Work with others or byYourself
7.Cons: Have to wear uniform, pants etc.

8.Pros: if you prefer to keep yourself busy with cleaning or anything when business slows down, this is for you
8.Cons: not as good raise opportunities as other companies

9.Pros: Everything is organized pretty well and you always know what is expected of you. What you do what you are,expected to do you will succeed.
9.Cons: Hours can be a little crazy and you're on your feet a lot. Youre also working with a lot of younger people and there is high turnover.
